PATIENT_ID: TEST_RIB2_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-10 20:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-10 20:10:00
Category II activation for 65-year-old male. Fall on ice.
Right-sided chest wall ecchymosis. Rib fractures suspected.
GCS 15. Right chest wall tenderness.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-10 20:30:00
Chest x-ray: possible right-sided rib fractures. Not clearly delineated.
Rib fracture suspected but count uncertain.
CT not obtained.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-10 20:50:00
Suspected rib fractures. No definitive count documented.
Lung volumes adequate on upright film.
Patient resting comfortably. Observation plan in place.
Admitted for observation. Pending further imaging.
